text.name: info3
text.text: The Super Game Boy is a peripheral that allows

text.name: info4
text.text: Game Boy cartridges to be played on a Super Nintendo

text.name: info5
text.text: Entertainment System console. It adds the ability to

text.name: info6
text.text: map the four shades of green to various colors on the

text.name: info7
text.text: screen as well as providing enhancements like special

text.name: info8
text.text: background sprites, additional colors and enhanced

text.name: info9
text.text: sound by utilizing the SNES hardware.
